name: initialize_logger
attributes: # [doc = " ロガーアカウントを初期化（bump と最初の残高 0）"]
body: let logger = & mut ctx . accounts . logger ;
logger . bump = * ctx . bumps . get ("logger") . unwrap () ;

name: record_token_balance
attributes: # [doc = " 指定トークンアカウントの lamports 残高を記録"]
body: let logger = & mut ctx . accounts . logger ;

fields.name: logger
fields.attribute: # [doc = " ロガーアカウント (PDA)"] # [account (init , payer = authority , seeds = [b"token_balance_logger" , authority . key () . as_ref ()] , bump , space = 8 + 1 + 8)]

fields.name: authority
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 初期化を実行する署名者"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: logger
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 既存のロガーアカウント"] # [account (mut , seeds = [b"token_balance_logger" , authority . key () . as_ref ()] , bump = logger . bump)]

fields.name: token_account
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 記録対象のアカウント（必ず SPL Token プログラム所有であることを検証）"] # [account (owner = token :: ID)]
